title: Favorite cryptocurrencies
text: On the pages of each cryptocurrency, click on the 'favorite' button to add the currency to the home page.

title: Help the project
text: Participate in the development of the project by adding comments to the Github project.

title: Copy your favorite items
text: In the table on the home page, the volumes and prices of each currency can be copied independently of each other by clicking on the button .

title: Suggest missing coins
text: If you cannot find your currency, you can request its addition by going to the suggestion page. This is available if your search leads nowhere.

title: Clean LocalStorage
text: You can clear your browser's site cache by going to the menu at the top right.
